entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
